verses.verse: I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at all <S%H6256>times<s%>: his <S%H8416>praise<s%> shall <S%H8548>continually<s%> be in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall make her <S%H1984>boast<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: the <S%H6035>humble<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8055>there<s%>, and be glad.
O <S%H1431>magnify<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H7311>me<s%>, and let us exalt his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.
I <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and he <S%H6030>heard<s%> <S%H5337>me<s%>, and delivered me from all my <S%H4035>fears<s%>.
They <S%H5027>looked<s%> unto <S%H5102>him<s%>, and were lightened: and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> were not <S%H2659>ashamed<s%>.
This poor <S%H6041>man<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3467>him<s%>, and saved him out of all his <S%H6869>troubles<s%>.
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2583>encamps<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H2502>him<s%>, and delivers them.
O <S%H2938>taste<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>: <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> that trusts in <S%H2620>him<s%>.
O <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you his <S%H6918>saints<s%>: for there is no <S%H4270>want<s%> to them that fear <S%H3373>him<s%>.
The young <S%H3715>lions<s%> do <S%H7326>lack<s%>, and suffer <S%H7456>hunger<s%>: but they that <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall not <S%H2637>want<s%> any good <S%H2896>thing<s%>.
<S%H3212>Come<s%>, you <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H3925>me<s%>: I will teach you the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
What <S%H376>man<s%> is he that <S%H2655>desires<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, and <S%H157>loves<s%> many <S%H3117>days<s%>, that he may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>?
<S%H5341>Keep<s%> your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and your <S%H8193>lips<s%> from <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully<s%>.
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>; <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and pursue <S%H7291>it<s%>.
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are upon the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, and his <S%H241>ears<s%> are open unto their <S%H7775>cry<s%>.
The <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is against them that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of them from the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The righteous <S%H6817>cry<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%>, and <S%H5337>delivers<s%> them out of all their <S%H6869>troubles<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> unto them that are of a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>; and <S%H3467>saves<s%> such as be of a <S%H1793>contrite<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> are the <S%H7451>afflictions<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> delivers him out of them <S%H5337>all<s%>.
He <S%H8104>keeps<s%> all his <S%H6106>bones<s%>: not <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H2007>them<s%> is <S%H7665>broken<s%>.
<S%H7451>Evil<s%> shall <S%H4191>kill<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: and they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H816>desolate<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6299>redeems<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>: and none of them that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him shall be <S%H816>desolate<s%>.
